author: hlship
msg: Rework form event management to be primarily a client-side concern.

author: pferraro
msg: Refactored and expanded validation functionality to include DatePicker, PropertySelection, RadioGroup, Select, TextArea, TextField, Upload, contrib:Palette, and contrib:MultiplePropertySelection.

author: hlship
msg: Fix some copyright dates and release numbers (that still said 3.1).

author: hlship
msg: Fix injection problems; InjectScriptWorker injects a DeferredScript, not an IScript.
Add super-verbose exception output when there's a failure instantiating a component class.
